chapter.title: Getting help
chapter.para: To get help when using pkgsrc, the definitive source is this document, the pkgsrc guide. If you don't find anything here, there are alternatives:

listitem.para: The built-in pkgsrc help, which is available after bootstrapping pkgsrc. Run bmake help topic=… to get help for any topic, such as a variable name like BUILD_DEFS, a make target like do-build, a missing C or C++ function like strcasecmp or any other topic.
The available help topics are listed in .
The pkgsrc-users mailing list, to which you can subscribe and then ask your questions.
The #pkgsrc IRC channel, which is accessible via a web browser or by using a specialized chat program such as XChat. Pick any user name and join the channel #pkgsrc.
